A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Fun movie. I would say that its one of the better movies in the franchise. Its far from perfect. There was some bad dialogue\, a lot of forces jokes\, some plot holes and some stuff that felt unimportant to the story. Most star wars movie have similar problems but that's not really an excuse for them to be there. As a story set in the star wars galaxy and as a continuation of the (still in progress) new trilogy\, I give it 4 stars. I had fun watching it and will probably go see it again.
